name: D.R.G-0
description:
D.R.G-0 (Drag Racing Game 0, pronounced drag-zero, or, if you want to, derg-zero) is a game about drag street racing (a-la Need for Speed Underground).

Why "zero"? Well, because it's my first (or 0th) game, because it's kind of a prototype, and, while it was definitely not zero-effort, it is pretty much zero-frills.

The game was made using the DragonRuby game toolkit, with use of assets by Kenney.
